attributes.action: Open Covid-19 safe hair salons  barbers and beauty salons
attributes.additional_details: As an industry we have spent time doing risk assessments planned ways of making sure staff and clients are safe, spent money investing and implementing safe procedures, clean and sanitise constantly and maintain safe work practices and ways of working. Let hair salons, barbers and beauty salons that meet these safe work processes open
attributes.background: The government are closing salons which are provably the most safe clean covid safe environments when other not so hygienic businesses are able to open

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319313
